snippet: Liverpool’s Luis Suárez was banned for eight matches after soccer authorities cited him for his conduct toward United’s Patrice Evra during a Premier League game in October.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United and Liverpool, whose last game began a racial dispute, are drawn to play in the fourth round of the FA Cup; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Liverpool’s Luis Suárez was banned for eight matches after soccer authorities cited him for his conduct toward United’s Patrice Evra during a Premier League game in October.

headline.seo: Liverpool and Manchester United to Meet in F.A. Cup
headline.main: English Teams Involved in Racial Dispute Will Meet in F.A. Cup
headline.print_headline: English Teams Involved in Racial Dispute Will Meet in F.A. Cup
